a.title: Legend for this format

description.value: The NOTE_NLP table encodes all output of NLP on clinical notes. Each row represents a single extracted term from a note.

definition.value: The NOTE_NLP table encodes all output of NLP on clinical notes. Each row represents a single extracted term from a note.
